#summary UrukDroid RescueMenu.

= Introduction =

Since UrukDroid 1.0 there is boot menu called "Rescue Menu". It's called during early boot up process - before any Android specific features are run. It's designed to allow boot other operating systems, restore "bare metal" backups etc.
